price: ߌ ߞߵߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߣߵߊ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߍ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ ߣߌ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲߬ߞߏ ߘߌ߫؟ ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߌߟߋ ߘߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߛߍ߲߬ߓߍ߬ߟߊ߲߫ ߘߌ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ أَفَأَنتَ تَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِ وَكِيلًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ara-ayta mani ittakhadha ilāhahu hawāhu afa-anta takūnu ʿalayhi wakīlan
